title: Quilt Magic Cross Kit, Cross
features: Ideal for making a no sew, quilted wall-hanging
Includes pre-cut foam board, assorted fabrics, pattern, instructions
No special tools, sewing, or gluing required
description: Make a unique quilted wall hanging to decorate any room in the house. These kits are fun and easy to make because they require no special tools, sewing, or gluing. Each kit comes with pre-cut foam board, assorted fabrics, a pattern and detailed instructions for creating your wall hanging. This kit contains lilies and the cross-12 by 12-inch. Frame not included. Made in USA.
